Interface View

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GameObserver, Observer, TurnObserver
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface View
extends TurnObserver, GameObserver
    A view is any views that observe the game and send commands to the controller. The view observes the Turn and the Game
